RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 12. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BASTIEN LE BROWN good position never far back to the half, roused into turn to go clear in the stretch run. MAMBA TWENTY FOUR pressed pace to the half, short lead to stretch, outgamed to wire. DROP IT lagged back to far turn, came on mildly in the stretch for show. NO HANG CHARLIE speed to the front from inside, ran on off rail stretch evenly. MIDNIGHT NIGHTMARE no speed to far turn, closed the gap from quarter pole. CAPPY HOUR raced along evenly from well off rail throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: No Hang Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside, ran on off rail stretch evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Drop It
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to far turn, came on mildly in the stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Mamba Twenty Four
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to the half, short lead to stretch, outgamed to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Nightmare
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn, closed the gap from quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Bastien Le Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to the half, roused into turn, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Cappy Hour
ENTRY.OWNER: Adams James M and Cox Christopher J
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from well off rail throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred) .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLUMN settled in with good position while never far back to the half under stout handling with a steady run to go clear to the wire. MAMITA LINDA no speed into first turn with a steady advance for the place spot. TWITTER TRAFFIC hounded leader to the half, chased into the stretch and settled for the third spot. LA CHAPEAU pressed pace, dueled to the half cleared to quarter pole but came up empty in the stretch run. TIZ BIZ chased to pair to far turn with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to pair to far turn with nothing left and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: Twitter Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: hounded leader to the half, chased into the stretch settled third

ENTRY.NAME: La Chapeau
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to the half cleared quarter pole empty

ENTRY.NAME: Mamita Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed into first turn with a steady advance for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Column
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to half, steady handling to go clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 12. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferr ed to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOOCH quick inside to the front well rationed while dueling to the stretch stayed on gamely to hold sway at the wire under stout handling. MUNI MUNI SLEW tracked three wide to turn, chased winner home not enough late. BEACH FRONT slow into stride to turn, rallied late stretch on for third spot. SUMMER STORM dueled off rail from winner to the stretch, gave in late stretch. GEMO RAIN raced along evenly with no late response when needed. MCGRAW always trailed from inside throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: McGraw
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed from inside throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Front
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride to turn, rallied late stretch on for third spot

ENTRY.NAME: Fooch
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick inside to the front well rationed dueling, held sway wire

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. K.K. Jayaraman & Dr. V. DeviJayaraman

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off rail from winner to the stretch, gave in late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gemo Rain
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Muni Muni Slew
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked three wide to turn, chased winner home not enough late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRETTY PATTY bit tardy from gate, recovered quickly, stalked leader to the turn, took over in hand, drew off while ridden out to the wire. TWISTED JUSTICE speed to the front from inside, collared into turn, bested rest. MISS SPRINGSTEEN raced along evenly for show while no match for top pair to wire. LESOTHO inside run throughout with no late kick in the stretch run. PARLAY CHARLIE never factored throughout Race was hand timed due to a beam out of order. ACM

ENTRY.NAME: Lesotho
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run throughout with no late kick in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Parlay Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Springsteen
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Townley James E
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly for show while no match for top pair to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Twisted Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside, collared into turn, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Patty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy stalked to turn, took over in hand, drew off ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONKEY ZONE chased to turn, dueled through the stretch, cleared good handling. DESERT HIGHWAY tracked outside to far turn, ran on stretch run for place spot. PRINCE OF ROSES speed to the front off rail dueled to stretch for show spot. GREENSFELDER trailed to the stretch never far back, closed the gap mildly late. FROOME (IRE) tried to keep up to far turn, came three wide into the stretch but empty in the late going.

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Roses
ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front off rail dueled to stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Monkey Zone
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to turn, dueled through the stretch, cleared good handling

ENTRY.NAME: Greensfelder
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to the stretch never far back, closed the gap mildly late

ENTRY.NAME: Froome (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to far turn three wide into stretch, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Highway
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside to far turn, ran on stretch run for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 5F Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 13600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOUISIANIMAL spinted cear from inside, well rationed to the stretch held sway. REVERE NOTE inside run to turn, bottled with no room, angled out for place. COUSIN ODELL inside speed to front, dueled turn ato stretch, weakened for show. PERFECT THUNDER had an awkward start from outside and never factored.

ENTRY.NAME: Louisianimal
ENTRY.OWNER: Mayo Tom and Tagg Team Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: spinted cear from inside, well rationed to the stretch held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Odell
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to front, dueled turn ato stretch, weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: Revere Note
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn, bottled with no room, angled out for place

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start outside never a factor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH MEADOWS chased to turn, dueled into the stretch, cleared off to the wire under stout handling. MOON PARTY unhurried early, rallied outside through the turn snd, ran on while for the place spot. SHESMYBROKER inside trip to turn, angled out in the stretch to be for along for the show spot. POQUITO ROSE saved ground to turn, angled out past quarter pole but leveled off in the final furlong. SHEZA HOOT broke well outside could not keep up to turn with a steady fade. C V THUNDER quick to the front outside, cleared to turn, dueled into stretch but stopped readily. CHARGAREE broke tardy, rushed to turn but through early from inside and never a real threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Chargaree
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, rushed, through early from inside, never a threat

ENTRY.NAME: Shesmybroker
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip to turn, angled out in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Poquito Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to turn, angled out past quarter pole, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: High Meadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to turn, dueled into stretch, cleared off to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied outside out of turn, ran on while for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Hoot
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well outside could not keep up to turn with a steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: C V Thunder
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick to the front outside, cleared to turn, dueled, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 95. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Race s For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WELL CONNECTED ran up to chase, dueled inside to the turn, kept on in the stretch run and gamely held to the wire in a good effort. D'MONEY HONEY inside run to the turn, stayed on in the stretch with a late kick through the final stages and just missed in a good effort. READY PURSUIT good position to turn, off rail run in the lane but leveled off in the late going. VASILEVSKIY (IRE) had an awkward start, rallied along in the lane to improve late. FRISCO LINE off rail run to turn while evenly throughout with no gain when needed. K W CAPTAIN HOOK quick speed from the gate to clear, dueled into turn but gave way in the stretch run. EL BOHEMIO broke awkward with a bad step from the gate, rushed but gave way readily. DRAFT CAPITAL off slow with no speed throughout while always far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Well Connected
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up to chase, dueled inside to the turn, kept on gamely held

ENTRY.NAME: El Bohemio
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkward with a bad step from gate, rushed, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: D'money Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the turn, stayed on in stretch, late kick missed

ENTRY.NAME: K W Captain Hook
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed from the gate to clear, dueled into turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Vasilevskiy (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rallied along in the lane run to improve late

ENTRY.NAME: Ready Pursuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to turn, off rail run in the lane, leveled off late

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Capital
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow with no speed throughout while always far back

ENTRY.NAME: Frisco Line
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to turn while evenly throughout with no gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 9 5F Turf CR: 80. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming P rice $16,000 (Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIS BOOM BOB sprinted well clear while, well handled throughout to hold sway through the final furlong to the wire. BLEST LIFE broke sharp, three wide run, inside thru the stretch and only closed the gap late. TWIRLING RUTH off rail run to turn, ran on from quarter pole to improve through the stretch. HOWIZEE raced along evenly while closing the gap in the stretch while outside. LADY JENNEVIERE far back to the turn, ran on inside through the final furlong to improve. YOGURT had an awkward start with an, inside run to the turn while never a factor outside in the stretch run. AWESOMELY SHY tried to keep while fading readily from the quarter pole. LA SMOOCHIE outsprinted for the lead with a steady fade throughout outside.

ENTRY.NAME: La Smoochie
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted for the lead with a steady fade throughout outside

ENTRY.NAME: Twirling Ruth
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail run to turn, ran on from quarter pole to improve stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Yogurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, inside run to turn while never a factor outside

ENTRY.NAME: Sis Boom Bob
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted well clear, well handled throughout to hold sway to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Howizee
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly while closing the gap in the stretch outside

ENTRY.NAME: Awesomely Shy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep while fading readily from the quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, three wide run, inside thru stretch, closed gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jenneviere
ENTRY.COMMENT: far back to the turn, run on inside in the final furlong, improve
